trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There was one other sighting in Abilene on or around January 29th 2008
Summary: 4 bright cone shaped lights climbed from the ground at a fast speed west of city
divs: Sighting Details4 bright symetric and equally spaced cone shaped lights climbed from the ground to thousands of feet into the sky until they disappeared at a fast speed west of city Abilene. The lights seemed to instantly vanish like the Starship Enterprise if you ever watched Star Trek. It was around 10pm local time.
